content: this is a beginner crochet pattern for a no-sew whale a squishy little friend --- to complete this pattern you will need these materials - two different colours of yarn one optional main colour and white - 5mm/h-8 crochet hook - 12mm safety eyes - tapestry needle - scissors - polyester fiber - stitch marker to complete this pattern you will need to know these stitches - chain - single_crochet - half-double_crochet - double_crochet - slip_stitch - increase - decrease - back loop only - front loop only --- you may not sell distribute or claim this pattern as your own you may sell the finished product made form this pattern
